tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  feedback TEXT,
  suggestion TEXT,
  date_submitted TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ContinuousImprovement (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeRecognition (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    recognition_type VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
